Container.Name: nginx-rtmp-multistream
Container.Overview:
Lightweight nginx + rtmp module for replicating streams.
More info: GitHub: https://github.com/DvdGiessen/nginx-rtmp-docker Unraid Blog: https://unraid.net/blog/unraid-streaming-server
Container.Requires: <br>Create directory and download nginx config file: <br>`mkdir /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/ && curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/MountainGod2/nginx-rtmp-docker/master/nginx.conf -o /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/nginx.conf` <br>Edit downloaded nginx.conf file to add RTSP stream details and/or change included Twitch samples: <br>`nano /mnt/user/appdata/nginx-rtmp/nginx.conf` <br>
